description: Matrix inverse of partition triangle A008284.
prog: (PARI) tp(n, k) = if (n<1, 0, if (k<1, 0, if (k == n, 1, if (k > n, 0, tp(n-1, k-1) + tp(n-k, k)))));tabl(nn) = {mtp = matrix(nn, nn, n, k, tp(n, k)); mtpi = mtp^(-1); for (n = 1, nn, for (k = 1, n, print1(mtpi[n, k], ", ");); print(););} \\ _Michel Marcus_, Mar 04 2014
author: _Christian G. Bower_, Feb 15 1999
